executive_summary.headline: IOS-003-B verified operational with zero policy interference
key_findings: IOS-003-B running continuously for 15+ hours with 63 detection cycles
Zero deltas detected - no intraday regime changes occurred (expected behavior)
Zero governance actions from IOS-003-B - complete policy isolation proven
Attribution clarity improved: Type X forensically classified into 3 categories
Learning pipeline operational - forecasts accumulating, outcomes resolving

objective_a_ios003b_24h_delta_verificati.description: First full operational window of intraday delta production

interpretation.zero_deltas_meaning: No intraday regime changes detected in target crypto assets
interpretation.this_is_expected: Market conditions stable - no squeeze breakouts occurred

objective_b_non_interference_proof.description: IOS-003-B does not alter regime policy, gating, or execution layers
objective_b_non_interference_proof.log_evidence: All cycles log: 'CANONICAL REGIME IS READ-ONLY - NO MODIFICATIONS'

objective_c_attribution_type_x_forensic.description: Forensic classification of Type X suppressions without fixing

HORIZON_NOT_MATURED.explanation: Suppressions awaiting outcome data - horizon not yet elapsed
HORIZON_NOT_MATURED.action_required: None - will auto-resolve when outcomes arrive

ATTRIBUTION_LOGIC_GAP.explanation: Outcome determined but attribution type not assigned by lesson extraction
ATTRIBUTION_LOGIC_GAP.root_cause: HYSTERESIS category suppressions lack attribution assignment logic
ATTRIBUTION_LOGIC_GAP.action_required: Day 6+ diagnostic: extend attribution logic to HYSTERESIS cases

MISSING_CONTEXT.explanation: No suppressions classified as missing context

objective_c_attribution_type_x_forensic.explicit_constraint_honored: No fixing, no tuning, no reclassification logic changes

objective_d_learning_continuity.description: Learning pipeline continues to accumulate and reconcile
objective_d_learning_continuity.note: 168h horizon showing active reconciliation (34 new pairs in 24h)

attribution_clarity_increased.actual: Type X classified into 3 forensic categories

raw_queries_attached.governance_actions: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fhq_governance.governance_actions_log WHERE initiated_at >= NOW() - '24h' = 508
raw_queries_attached.type_x_forensic: SELECT forensic_category, regret_classification, COUNT(*) FROM epistemic_suppression_ledger WHERE regret_attribution_type IS NULL GROUP BY 1,2
raw_queries_attached.forecast_accumulation: SELECT DATE(forecast_made_at), COUNT(*) FROM forecast_ledger GROUP BY 1

closing_statement.text: Day 5 delivered clarity without action. IOS-003-B proven safe. Attribution gaps understood, not fixed. Learning continues. This is how calibration locks are earned.
